text: U Got 2 Know is the second and most successful studio album by Italian Eurodance act Cappella. The album was initially released via the Mercury Records label on March 7, 1994, and later re-released via other labels with slightly different track listings. The album saw great success in many European countries, peaking at #1 in the Swiss and Finnish charts.
